cases.description: Score 0 - very low seizure risk (<5%), no EEG findings
cases.source: Struck AF, et al. JAMA Neurology. 2017;74(12):1419-1424. All false = 0.

cases.description: Score 1 - low seizure risk (12%), single finding: sporadic epileptiform discharges
cases.source: Struck AF, et al. JAMA Neurology. 2017. Sporadic epileptiform (+1) = 1.

cases.description: Score 3 - moderate-high risk (50%), frequency >2Hz + LPD + prior seizure
cases.source: Struck AF, et al. JAMA Neurology. 2017. Freq>2Hz (+1) + LPD/BIPD/LRDA (+1) + Prior seizure (+1) = 3.

cases.description: Score 5 - very high risk (88%), multiple findings including BIRDs
cases.source: Struck AF, et al. JAMA Neurology. 2017. Freq>2Hz (+1) + LPD (+1) + Plus features (+1) + BIRDs (+2) = 5.

cases.description: Maximum score 7 - extremely high risk (>95%), all findings present
cases.source: Struck AF, et al. JAMA Neurology. 2017. All criteria: 1+1+1+1+1+2 = 7.
